Lighting Tower with Generator
Previous Next

USD 1111

Energy

This 45 Kva generator can supply continuous electrical power (at variable loads) in lieu of commercially purchased power. There is no limitation to the annual hours of operation and this model can supply 10% overload power for 1 hour in 12 hours. Includes spare parts and a road trailer and runs off of diesel fuel.
